scenario_text.value: Hello, Takuma. We haven’t had any luck here.

W-wait! There might still be places we
haven’t checked. Let’s not move on yet.

And that, as you can see, is why we’ve stuck
around.

(Shuuji’s probably got his hands full with
Ryo. Maybe if I say something it’ll help?)
(What should I say here?)
Keep going, Ryo!
Sounds rough, Shuuji.
Gotta be thorough.
Keep going, Ryo!

It’s important that you keep going, Ryo. We
all need your help to find this ghost!
Th-that’s why I’m being so thorough!

You know, this thing might be hostile. Can
you imagine being attacked by a ghost?
The thing to do is to stay out of trouble...

It’s no use, Takuma. Let me deal with Ryo.
You go keep looking around.
Yeah... Thanks...
Sounds rough, Shuuji.
Sounds rough, Shuuji.

I guess. But you know, Ryo always comes
through when it counts.

I’ll stay here and help him look around until
he calms down.
That’s kind of you, Shuuji.

Well, I know how it feels to be scared like
that.

To be honest, I’m pretty freaked out myself.
Don’t tell anyone, though.
Ahaha, no problem.
Gotta be thorough.
You’re right, Ryo, you’ve gotta be thorough.

Right? It’s important! I’ve just...gotta keep
looking around here!

*sigh* Yeah, okay. I’ll stay here until you
calm down, Ryo.

G-good. I’m... I’m totally calm, but...I’m
glad you’re sticking around.
All right, I’ll leave this place to you two.

Sounds good. And don’t worry, I’ll deal with
Ryo.
Uh, Shuuji? Where’s Lopmon?

Hm? Oh yeah, I don’t see him. Maybe he went
to check somewhere else?

Kunemon? You’re there, right?! Come here,
would you? I bet you’re scared.
Geww... Mugewww!

Hmm... I’m worried about Lopmon, but I’d hate
to leave Ryo here alone...

Hey, I’ll keep an eye out for him while I’m
looking around.
You will? That’d be a huge help, thanks.

Hi, Takuma. I’m afraid Ryo’s not doing much
better.
Hey! I’m just bein’ thorough!
